name: Inside No. 9 Halloween special
summary: When Arthur finds an old mobile phone in his local graveyard, he makes the mistake of trying to contact the owner. But some mysteries are best left unsolved, and as Halloween draws near Arthur is plunged into a nightmare of his own making.
info:
• 中文名: 9号秘事 万圣节特别篇
  • 集数: 1
  • 开始: 2018-10-28
  • 结束: 2018-10-28
  • 类型: 惊悚/悬疑/剧情/黑色喜剧
  • 国家/地区: 英国
  • 语言: 英语
